name: Escape the Abandoned Space Station
description:
This is my final 3D platformer project

My modifications were:

1: Re-textured the environment as well as added pipes for the theme (in the MacOS build I added some models into Level 2 but they are not in windows, there were some errors in making the build so I thought it was safer to delete them. I was also not able to make a WebGL build because of this same issue.)

2: I redesigned the level layouts 

3: I changed the game music to a track made in garageband

P.S I somehow got unity to work on my MacBook! I had messaged unity a while ago and they finally got back to me, and something they told me to do fixed the problem! Unfortunately, the Plastic SCM had a few complications with the input manager that I wasn't able to figure out so I just redid the project entirely. I would have been more detailed with the final project but all of this added up to not having enough time. Just wanted to let you know! 

Made By Rachel Flatley
